data.name: AdminSubtitle
data.value: Comprehensive management with a strategic approach

data.name: AdminText1
data.value: I have solid experience in administrative, accounting, and legal areas, complemented with commercial advising and client development for companies.

data.name: AdminText2
data.value: I have managed administrative and financial processes with precision, from accounting organization, expense control, bank reconciliations, and documentation management, to comprehensive supplier and client support.

data.name: AdminText3
data.value: As a legal assistant, I supported law firms and organizations with civil, immigration, and registry procedures, handling drafting, submission, and follow-up of files with responsibility and professional focus.
